html:
Fundamentals of Accounting and Finance

You will learn the meaning behind the financial data used within business organizations. All topics are explored in an analytical and evaluative manner, and the data is critically appraised for its use in business decision making.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Demonstrate knowledge and understanding of key accounting concepts and principles. [Knowledge & Understanding, Learning].

+  Understand and prepare basic accounting statements and understand how these can be important for business analysis. [Analysis and Application].

+  Apply basic management accounting analysis to different business and/or societal situations. [Problem Solving & Application].

+  Evaluate and analyse basic capital investment appraisal. [Analysis and Application].

Module Content:
